snippet: Alex Rodriguez said Saturday that he was eager to embrace the challenge of coming back from both the operation and an abysmal finish to last season.
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez said Saturday that he was eager to embrace the challenge of coming back from both the operation and an abysmal finish to last season.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Alex Rodriguez Discusses Plans for Hip Surgery
headline.main: Rodriguez Discusses Plans for Hip Surgery
headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Discusses Plans for Hip Surgery
